quote: He can surround a sword with flames."" 	Freya sounded proud of him. That irritated Ena. He was her prisoner and only she had the right to feel proud of him as far as she was concerned.
quote_letters: HE CAN SURROUND A SWORD WITH FLAMES FREYA SOUNDED PROUD OF HIM THAT IRRITATED ENA HE WAS HER PRISONER AND ONLY SHE HAD THE RIGHT TO FEEL PROUD OF HIM AS FAR AS SHE WAS CONCERNED
